formattedAddress: 654 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 654 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: Rashi was instrumental in finding an apartment for my son who had just accepted a job in Manhattan. The housing market is challenging to maneuver for someone who's not local and Rashi guided us through the city with ease.  We flew in early on a Tuesday to meet Rashi in the East Village at 11AM.  She had secured 14 appointments for us.  We were thrilled to have her with us during the showings as we would have been overwhelmed by ourselves.  The application process was another hurdle she guided us through.  We got lucky as we got approved for the apartment my son preferred.  Rashi has stayed in touch even after my son moved in and has provided valuable recommendations for various things around the city. We can confidentely recommend using Rashi for any of your real estate needs. She is pleasant, efficient and and knows the city and the market inside and out.

originalText.text: Rashi helped me find exactly what I was looking for in my first apartment in NYC (Manhattan). I told her my price range and what I was looking for in an apartment and neighborhood, and she took care of the rest. She set up over a dozen apartment tours for me to attend in a single day and made my apartment search as smooth as possible. Thanks Rashi!
